name: Zhong Guo
story: Zhong Guo was born in a small village in China. He joined the army at a young age, driven by a desire to serve his country. With a natural aptitude for engineering and technology, he quickly rose through the ranks and became an Asst. Missile Specialist. He is a devoted husband and father, and spends his free time practicing Buddhist meditation to stay calm and focused in high-pressure situations.
